pages.text: Champions are warriors that are fast and athletic. They have an impressive reaction speed that can even slice the fastest arrows.

pages.title: Passive Abilities
pages.text: $(li) +20% Attack speed: Any melee weapon used gains 1.2 x AttackSpeed = NewAttackSpeed $(li) +15% Movement speed: Any movement, walking, running or sneaking gets a 1.15 x MovementSpeed = NewMovementSpeed. This is stacked with other speed change attributes such as speed potions.
$(li) -10% Attack damage: Any melee weapon gains 0.9 x AttackDamage = NewAttackDamage.
